about_the_game:
Beware Of Dog immerses players in an exciting third-person action-adventure/slasher game. Our heroes, Grandpa Jackhammer and his faithful Dog, found themselves face to face with the problem of meat shortages in stores. With fire and an 85-inch wrench, they carved their way to the goal, not even thinking about where they would end up in the end. The world had split and gone mad, but no one noticed. Life goes on, saleswomen are rude to customers, bears deliver pizza, elves engage in robbing late pedestrians. Everything is out of place here, and chaos reigns.

You will take on the role of a retired steel mill worker, nicknamed Jackhammer for his inhuman strength, accompanied by his dog, named Dog. What started as a simple mission to buy meat at the grocery store will turn into an epic adventure in which our heroes will battle with criminal authorities, dragons, and other GIANT creatures, and discover that things, creatures, and substances are not always what they seem.

Features:

• Fast-paced combat using a diverse arsenal of melee and ranged weapons.

• Combo system.

• Variety of unlockable skills and techniques.

• Uninterrupted gameplay without loading screens.

• Allies who assist in battle and lift your spirits with their witty remarks.

• A hero who can JUMP.

• Platforming sections and puzzles.

• Captivating storyline.

name: Beware of Dog

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 7 64bit
  • Processor: 3000 Mhz x4 CPU
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX11 compatible, 4 GB VRAM
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 10 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

short_description: Beware Of Dog is a fast paced Action Adventure game with RPG elements set in eclectic insane world where our heroes grandpa Domkrat and his faithful Dog embark on their journey to buy some meat.
